meta.title: Growth Mindset in Action
meta.description: See how to apply growth mindset in real situations

texts.scenario: You're struggling with a difficult math problem and feel like giving up.
texts.action1: Reframe: "I can't do this yet" instead of "I can't do this"
texts.action2: Break it down: Split the problem into smaller, manageable steps
texts.action3: Seek help: Ask a teacher or peer to explain a tricky concept
